content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The first and the most important thing is the title. These words should catch the reader's attention and make him understand what the text is about. It is good idea to use a verb because it makes the header more dynamic. The title should not be longer than five words. Make sure that is does not contain terms and abbreviations since they can be misunderstood by readers. For example: \\\"Project TGFILBDL2212 / version2. Completed\\\" is a failed title. It is a good idea to use play on words, phraseological units, and paradoxical phrases.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The second important thing is the first paragraph. Infoportal uses the lead which reveals the essence of the text: where and when the event happened/will happen; or it presents the most important information of the text. It should not be longer than five sentences. It is unacceptable that lead begins with a digression.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If the target audience is situated in a particular region, please mention it in the lead: \\\"In Kharkov the project have started...\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
